page.title: 15JOHN F. KENNEDY SCHOOL II.
page.content:
J.F.K SCHOOL IS NAMED AFTER THE AMERICAN PRESIDENT JOHN FITZGERALD KENNEDY. OUR SCHOOL UNIFORM CONSISTS OF A WHITE SHIRT, A RED TIE, GREEN JUMPER, WITH THE BOYS WEARING BLACK TROUSERS AND THE GIRLS WEARING PRINCESS MARGARET ROSE TARTAN KILTS.
OUR HEADMASTER IS MR. STOTHARD AND WE HAVE TWO DEPUTY HEADS, MR. LEY AND MRS. HARRISON. IN OUR SCHOOL WE HAVE A MAIN TEACHING BLOCK, THREE FLOORS HIGH, THEN THERE IS THE 'O' BLOCK AND THE ART BLOCK, INCLUDING AN ORATORY SINCE IT IS A CATHOLIC SCHOOL. THERE IS ALSO A BLOCK CONTAINING THE HALL, THE STAFF ROOM, GYM AND CHANGING ROOMS.
OUTSIDE THERE IS A RUGBY PITCH, RUNNING TRACK, NETBALL COURTS AND FOOTBALL AND HOCKEY PITCHES.
